description: If Modification Postion is blank, then Modification Type must be blank
If Modification Type is blank, then Modification Position must be blank
Each Modification Type must be in PTM_list table
Number of positions does not match number of number of modification types
MHC Molecule must be from molecule table
Peptide Sequence and MHC Molecule are required fields for any entry
Peptide Sequence and MHC Molecule are required fields for any entry
Peptide Sequence must contain valid amino acids
Modification Position must follow syntax of comma separated list of amino acids followed by position
